text: aur oont mein se do tatha gaay mein se do. aap poochhiye ki kya allaah ne donon ke nar haî€¼raam (varjit) kiye hain athava donon kee maada athava donon ke garbh mein jo bachche hon? kya tum upasthit the, jab allaah ne tumhen isaka aadesh diya tha, to batao? usase bada atyaachaaree kaun hoga, jo bina gyaan ke allaah par jhooth ghade? nishchay allaah atyaachaariyon ko sammaarg nahin dikhaata
